text: Vittus Qujaukitsoq (born October 5, 1971 in Qaanaaq, Greenland, Kingdom of Denmark) is a Greenlandic politician. He was previously a member of Siumut, and served as Minister of Business, Labour, Trade and Foreign Affairs in the Kielsen government. He was one of the founders of Nunatta Qitornai in September 2017. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Siumut politicians Category:Government ministers of Greenland Category:Greenlandic Inuit people Category:Independence activists Category:1971 births
title: Vittus Qujaukitsoq
